availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Orlean B. Nichols (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Farmhand for L. Perry in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 48th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from October 26, 1863, to December 25, 1863. Died of disease while in military service at Princeton on December 25, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 59.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administrators Bonds, 1863-1878, p. 29.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0446.
